name: 大学生暑假模拟器（Summer Vacation Simulator for College Students）
name_original: 大学生暑假模拟器（Summer Vacation Simulator for College Students）
description:
目前，抑郁症、空心病等心理疾病逐渐增多，且有着年轻化的趋势，关注大学生的心理健康，成为了刻不容缓的事情。作为一名在校大学生乃至于游戏开发者。同时作为一位在疫情在家期间产生过一定心理问题的学生。我希望通过游戏模拟的方式，来模拟大学生独自在家中的行为，让玩家找到学业、体力、心情等平衡点。从而提高公众对大学生心理的重视与思考。

在游戏中，我设计了很多交互的模块，如睡觉、商店、游戏厅、电脑编程等可操作模块，玩家在游戏中将通过策略性的选择交互，从而对资源系统——体力、心情、金钱乃至于他们自己的学业进行间接操作，寻求平衡，从而度过一个完美的假期。

此游戏由本人单人完成，使用唤境引擎，游戏中素材来源于免费以及购买素材库，以及部分ps绘图获得。

At present, depression, hollow disease and other mental diseases are gradually increasing, and there is a trend of younger, pay attention to the mental health of college students, has become an urgent matter. As a college student and as a game developer. At the same time, as a student who had some psychological problems during the epidemic at home. I hope to simulate the behavior of college students alone at home through game simulation, so that players can find the balance between study, physical strength and mood. Thus, the public should pay more attention to and think about college students' psychology.

In the game, I had a lot of interaction design module, such as sleeping, shops, games and computer programming can be operation module, the choice of players in the game through strategic interaction, thereby the resource system, physical strength, mood, money and even their own academic and indirect operation, seek a balance, to have a perfect vacation.

This game is completed by myself, using the environment calling engine. The materials in the game come from free and purchased materials library, as well as some PS drawings.
